projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Build a complete e-commerce platform with user management, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.name: Mobile App Backend
projects.description: RESTful API backend for a mobile application with real-time notifications, user authentication, and content management.

projects.name: Data Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Create an analytics dashboard with real-time data visualization, reporting tools, and export capabilities.

projects.name: Cloud Migration Project
projects.description: Migrate existing infrastructure to cloud platform with improved scalability and performance.

projects.name: Customer Support System
projects.description: Build a support ticket system with chat integration, knowledge base, and automated responses.

projects.name: Inventory Management
projects.description: Develop inventory tracking system with barcode scanning, stock alerts, and supplier management.
